scripts.launch:ts: npm run build:ts && npm run launch:happ:ts
scripts.launch:kd: npm run build:kd && npm run launch:happ:kd
scripts.launch:happ:ts: RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc launch --piped -n 2 ./apps/launcher/workdir/talking-stickies.happ -w --ui-path apps/launcher/ui/public network mdns
scripts.launch:happ:kd: RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc launch --piped -n 1 ./apps/launcher-kando/workdir/kando.happ -w --ui-path apps/launcher-kando/ui/public network mdns
scripts.start:ts: npm run build:ts && npm run start:agent:ts
scripts.start:kd: npm run build:kd && npm run start:agent:kd
scripts.start:playground: npm run build:happ && npm run start:agent:playground
scripts.start:agent:ts: cross-env UI_PORT=5000 APP_PORT=$(port) ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run start:happ:ts" "npm run dev:watch -w talking-stickies-app"
scripts.start:agent:kd: cross-env UI_PORT=5000 APP_PORT=$(port) ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run start:happ:kd" "npm run dev:watch -w kando-app"
scripts.start:agent:playground: cross-env UI_PORT=5000 APP_PORT=$(port) ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run playground" "npm run start:happ" "npm run start:ui:watch"
scripts.start:agent:multi: cross-env UI_PORT=$(port) APP_PORT=$(port) ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run start:happ" "npm run start:ui:watch"
scripts.start:happ:ts: echo "starting hc instance: $APP_PORT" && RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc s -f=$ADMIN_PORT --piped generate ./apps/launcher/workdir/talking-stickies.happ --run=$APP_PORT -a talking-stickies$APP_PORT network mem
scripts.start:happ:kd: echo "starting hc instance: $APP_PORT" && RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc s -f=$ADMIN_PORT --piped generate ./apps/launcher-kando/workdir/kando.happ --run=$APP_PORT -a kando$APP_PORT network mem
scripts.package:applet:ts: npm run build -w "@holo-host/boardz"  -w talking-stickies-we-applet && npm run package -w talking-stickies-we-applet
scripts.package:applet:kd: npm run build -w "@holo-host/boardz"  -w kando-we-applet && npm run package -w kando-we-applet
scripts.package:launcher:ts: npm run build -w "@holo-host/boardz" -w talking-stickies-app && npm run package -w talking-stickies-app && hc web-app pack ./apps/launcher/workdir
scripts.package:launcher:kd: npm run build -w "@holo-host/boardz" -w kando-app && npm run package -w kando-app && hc web-app pack ./apps/launcher-kando/workdir
